snippet: After being crushed by Novak Djokovic 6-1, 6-2 in the Qatar Open final on Saturday, Rafael Nadal admired the Serb's handiwork....
lead_paragraph: After being crushed by Novak Djokovic 6-1, 6-2 in the Qatar Open final on Saturday, Rafael Nadal admired the Serb's handiwork.

headline.print_headline: Djokovic Touches Perfection in Crushing Nadal in Qatar Final
headline.main: Djokovic Touches Perfection in Crushing Nadal in Qatar Final
